RTCPeerConnectionGetIdentityAssertion.summary:
The getIdentityAssertion() method of the interface initiates the gathering of an identity assertion.
This has an effect only if the is not "closed".

remarks.para: The method returns a JavaScript which resolves to an identity assertion encoded as a string.
It is not expected for the application dealing with the RTCPeerConnection: this is automatically done; an explicit call only allows to anticipate the need.
